Name: TRASHMORFERS
About the game: TRASHMORFERS- LET THEIR OWN WASTE BECOME THEIR OWN ENEMY You are in the near future in a dystopic but realistic earth where the unrecycled trash has taken a monstrous form, known as Trashmorfers, and dominated the entire world. You have to save the earth from this destructive pollution…before it’s too late for the human kind. Third and First Person Choice Use unlimited bullets and two different weapons to complete the quest Find the life potion Protect yourself inside the Sanctuary Zone Destroy the Trashmorfers: the PVCs, the Trashmen and the WEEEs (Waste of Electrical and Electronic Equipment) Find Keys to deactivate TAI (the Transform Artificial Intelligence) Be friends with our cute ally, aka LFF Be aware of the ecological catastrophe that the human kind has caused because it’s your turn now to save our planet New missions and multiplayer coming soon We are two new developers from Greece. Our passion for games and our concerns about the environment urge us to create our very first game. We work hard to continually evolve it. Thank you all for your support and please be lenient! IMMERSE YOURSELF IN NEXT- GEN SCI-FI ADVENTURE that raises ecological awareness and captures your mind You are in the near future when human activity has seriously contaminated the entire planet. You are in a polluted nature where the trash outnumbers humans. A transform artificial intelligence has been placed on earth (by whom?) with the purpose to transform all the waste into actual enemy soldiers. Vast quantities of Single- use plastic form PVC 450 Con army, countless electrical and electronic devices form the WEEE army and the rest junk form the trashman army. According to your mac ios , the desktop icon might not work and you have to find the executable file from the local files.
